channel.title: Introduction on Glaðsheimr
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Glaðsheimr

item.title: Orchestration
item.description: Hybrid Device Applications The ability to leverage FPGA, Microcontrollers and ASIC devices is that TinyML application can take advantage of each devices’ specialties. FPGAs can provide low latency (<= 1ms), amazing connectivity (direct pin access) and potential low power consumption depending on the application. One the other hand micro-controller significantly reduce engineering time. (See other advantages of other device types). Concept Predicting water pouring in a room Collecting audio and classification can be currently done using TinyML and PDM devices (Tensorflow Lite Micro).
